input.value: AO did not find the disk usage to breach the threshold.
Unable to determine disk space usage. Please check AO workflow input parameters.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <matching-values> <xsl:for-each select="//line"> <xsl:if test="text()="Deleting BadMail directory files...""> <matching-value> <xsl:copy-of select=""Found a match"" /> </matching-value> </xsl:if> </xsl:for-each> </matching-values> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

input.value: BadMail directory cleanup failed. Please use operator assisted remediation process to reclaim disk.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <matching-values> <xsl:for-each select="//line"> <xsl:if test="text()="Deleting SMTP protocol log files...""> <matching-value> <xsl:copy-of select=""Found a match"" /> </matching-value> </xsl:if> </xsl:for-each> </matching-values> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

input.value: SMTP Protocol logs cleanup failed. Please use operator assisted remediation process to reclaim disk.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <matching-values> <xsl:for-each select="//line"> <xsl:if test="text()="Deleting message tracking log files...""> <matching-value> <xsl:copy-of select=""Found a match"" /> </matching-value> </xsl:if> </xsl:for-each> </matching-values> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

input.value: Message Tracking logs cleanup failed. Please use operator assisted remediation process to reclaim disk.
Disk usage issue could not be remediated despite Exchange Server logs cleanup. Please use operator assisted remediation process to reclaim disk.
Unable to determine disk space usage after cleanup action. Please check AO workflow input parameters.

documentation.description:
Use Case Description -------------------------------- 1. Disk Full Event is generated in Event Management for the Exchange Server (for example BEM). The corresponding event should have the message text as "Low Disk Space on Exchange Server"
2. AO verifies the condition that disk space threshold has been breached
3. If disk space threshold breached - AO executes remediation actions on the Exchange directory
4. AO validates the remediation disk clean up action
5. If remediated suppress event
